Preprocessing: Six features are given for each yacht.
Reference: page = Gerritsma, J., R. Onnink, and A. Versluis.Geometry, resistance and stability of the delft systematic yacht hull series. Delft University of Technology, 1981.
Creator: R. Lopez

Brief description: 5 data sets that center around robotic failure to execute common tasks.
Preprocessing: Integer valued features such as torque and other sensor measurements.
Reference: Liu, Huan, and Hiroshi Motoda. Feature extraction, construction and selection: A data mining perspective. Springer Science & Business Media, 1998.
Creator: L. Seabra et al.

Brief description: Design description is given in terms of several properties of various bridges.
Reference: Reich, Yoram. Converging to Ideal Design Knowledge by Learning. [Carnegie Mellon University], Engineering Design Research Center, 1989.Todorovski, Ljupčo, and Sašo Džeroski.Experiments in meta-level learning with ILP. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 1999.
Creator: Y. Reich et al.

Brief description: Data about automobiles, their insurance risk, and their normalized losses.
Reference: Wang, Yong. A new approach to fitting linear models in high dimensional spaces. Diss. The University of Waikato, 2000. doi=10.1111/j.1467-8640.1989.tb00315.x
Creator: J. Schimmer et al.

Preprocessing: Eight features of each car given.
Reference: Palmer, Christopher R., and Christos Faloutsos. "Electricity based external similarity of categorical attributes." Advances in Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2003. 486–500.
Creator: Carnegie Mellon University

Brief description: Heating and cooling requirements given as a function of building parameters.
Creator: A. Xifara et al.

Brief description: A series of aerodynamic and acoustic tests of two and three-dimensional airfoil blade sections.
Preprocessing: Data about frequency, angle of attack, etc., are given.
Reference: Brooks, Thomas F., D. Stuart Pope, and Michael A. Marcolini. Airfoil self-noise and prediction. Vol. 1218. National Aeronautics and Space Administration, Office of Management, Scientific and Technical Information Division, 1989.

Dataset Name: Challenger USA Space Shuttle O-Ring Dataset
Brief description: Attempt to predict O-ring problems given past Challenger data.
Preprocessing: Several features of each flight, such as launch temperature, are given.
Reference: Draper, David. "Assessment and propagation of model uncertainty." Journal of the Royal Statistical Society, Series B (Methodological) (1995): 45–97. doi=10.1080/01621459.1991.10475132
Creator: D. Draper et al.

Reference: Wang, Jun, Bei Yu, and Les Gasser. "Concept tree based clustering visualization with shaded similarity matrices." Data Mining, 2002. ICDM 2003. Proceedings. 2002 IEEE International Conference on. IEEE, 2002.
